attributes.action: make the Student Loans Company liable to pay any interest that 2009 students incur on loans they have to take out to cover tuition fees  because the SLC failed to get them their loans on time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Student Loans Company (SLC) have failed to get thousands of students their loans on time, many will be forced to take out other loans in order to cover their tuition fees. We believe that any interest that these loans incur should not be paid by us as it is not our fault that we did not reciever our financial help on time.
